article.title: Harris Corporation Awarded $53 Million Production Contract for Navy MH-60R Helicopter Data Link
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Harris Corporation has been awarded a $53 million contract modification by the U.S. Navy to produce the Ku-band common data link (CDL) Hawklink system for the MH-60R light airborne multi-purpose system helicopter. Hawklink is a high-speed digital data link that transmits tactical video, radar, acoustic and other sensor data from MH-60R helicopters to their host surface ships.
